SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.debugging

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.debugging
This package contains classes and interfaces used for debugging.

The DebugReporter can be used to generate a debug report. This report is generated using all IDebuggable subclasses that have been registered with the DebuggableRegistry.

Each debuggable class can determine how to handle the generation of a debug report on its own.

    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.restartable
    Contains classes and interfaces used to easily restart objects.
